channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Constant littering here - please do something to help prevent it, 30th October
item.description:
Items regularly chucked in this area which is the main entrance to the estate, beers cans, lunch rubbish, nos bottles, fag butts, other rubbish Not great for residents in this area
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Buccaneer Avenue, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The inclined stretch of pavement and of road around half way up Mill Street is now dangerously covered in a think layer of rotting leaves and other vegetation. As such it presents a serious hazard to pedestrians and cyclists/drivers., 30th October

About half way along Mill Street Prestbury where there is an incline around the bend not far from St Maryâ€™s Church.

item.title: Pooling water on pavement, 30th October
item.description:
///epic.puzzle.hang After rain a large pool forms which prevents residents from walking on the pavement. Please see the photographs of an elderly neighbor walking on the road being passed by a cyclist and a car.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Leckhampton Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees) problem, 30th October
item.description:
Customer reporting that a vehicle has driven into a signpost at location. Post has been bent ~30 degrees back into the property hedge - no current obstruction of f/way or c/way, Police are dealing with vehicle and driver (vehicle details attached). Customer asking for post to be removed.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees)
